uniovi.assign.model

Class Planification

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniovi.assign.model.Planification

  • public class Planification
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents the complete planification of the school. It contains the information about the students and its enrollments and all the subjects with the information about the subject classes and groups.

      Default constructor for a planification object.
